title: Task 38

question.text: How does Alice feel about the guessing game?

answers.answer: She likes it and says she's ready to start
She thinks it's a very difficult task for her, so she quits
answers.feedback: On the contrary, she says she's up for it.

answers.answer: She proposes a challenge to decide who can start the game
answers.feedback: She mentions a challenge just to say that she is ready for it.

answers.answer: She thinks it's a challenge for her because the sounds of the words are fun
answers.feedback: When she says sounds fun, she means she likes the idea of playing the game.

dialogue.text: Sounds fun. I'm up for the challenge.

description:
A challenge is something that is hard to do and needs a lot of effort. For example, if you say learning a new language can be a challenge., you mean that learning a language is something that tests your skills and determination.

When you say I'm up for the challenge, you mean that you are ready and willing to try something difficult.
